thread.title: Yo-yo dieter Chantelle Houghton shows off slightly fuller figure just months after flaunting weight loss
thread.title_full: Yo-yo dieter Chantelle Houghton shows off slightly fuller figure just months after flaunting weight loss

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Yo-yo dieter Chantelle Houghton shows off slightly fuller figure just months after flaunting weight loss
text:
Chantelle's new figure (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It looks like Chantelle Houghton has given up on her new years resolution. 
The Big Brother star, who's known for her yo-yo dieting, has stepped out showing a slightly fuller figure just months after insisting that she was determined to get into shape. 
Despite flaunting a slimmed down figure in November , Chantelle stepped out with a pal yesterday in a pair of black leggings and an unflattering green t-shirt that clung to her curves. 
The star, who won CBB in 2006, has made no secret of her weight struggles over the years and has become known as somewhat of a yo-yo dieter. Chantelle flashed her curves (Photo: FameFlynet) She wore a form-fitting green top (Photo: FameFlynet) The star seemed to be in high spirits (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Last year she vowed to get back down to a size 10 after horrid Twitter trolls mocked her weight gain and she herself even admitted she looked like “Chantelle Four Bellies” due to her unhealthy pizza and carb-heavy diet. 
“I looked horrific. Men wouldn’t go near me when I looked like beached whale”, she admitted. Read More She's known for yo-yo dieting (Photo: FameFlynet) (Photo: FameFlynet) Union J's Jaymi Hensley 'set to enter Celebrity Big Brother house this summer' 
Chantelle, who shares four-year-old daughter Dolly with kickboxer Alex Reid , 41, was offered free liposuction by her ex last summer, with Alex telling Now magazine in August: "Despite all of the stressful times that we have been through, she’s still the mother of my child. 
"I want to try and offer an olive branch and why not? I want to keep Chantelle healthy. The last thing I want her to do is something potentially dangerous with surgery, so non-invasive liposuction would be the perfect solution." She showed off a slimmer figure in November (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Last year, Chantelle sparked concern after showing off a huge pout and dramatically bigger lips just days after having her lips plumped up again. 
Addressing the controversy at the time, she explained: "I know thy look insane. They're settling down, but they were very swollen. People tell me I look like a fish and that I look ridiculous - 'trout pout', 'Donal Duck'... I get it all. But I like them. They make me happy."
